title: Santa Monica
name: Typhoon
content: Best known for its exotic fried insects, this pan-asian restaurant also serves dim sum and sushi, Malasian and Thai, in a unique setting with a view of the runway.  Window tables have great views of the runway activity.  Try the steamed whole fish (bass or catfish).  Adventurous eaters can try tasty appetizers of crickets, scorpions, sea worms and ants.  MSG used, so be sure to ask for your food without it if it disagrees with you.
